definition: to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: The interviewer spends a lot of time answering your questions.
sentences.chinese: 面试官花大批时间答复你的问题。

sentences.english: To this the unthinking will give an off-hand answer .
sentences.chinese: 给我一个直截了当的答复。

sentences.english: I'll gie you a definite answer tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天我将给你一个确切答复。

sentences.english: He neglected to reply to the invitation.
sentences.chinese: 他忘记封那邀请作答复。

sentences.english: I am breathing in Thy answers, Stilling every doubt and fear.
sentences.chinese: 我今呼入你的答复，平静疑惑和惊恐。

sentences.english: Until now it has met with no response. (See "Talks, first" page 48 report 77).
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，它没有收到答复见面。

sentences.english: We demanded that they give us a definite answer.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求他们给个确切的答复。

sentences.english: Should you have any questions please let us know.
sentences.chinese: 我们等待您的即刻答复。

sentences.english: They have not understood a word of his fevered reply.
sentences.chinese: 他们不理解一个词，他发烧的答复。

sentences.english: If you don't receive an answer quickly, give them a prod.
sentences.chinese: 你要是不能很快得到答复，不妨催他们一下。

sentences.english: B: Let me take a look at the schedule first. I'll get back to you this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 我先看一下时间表，下午答复你。

sentences.english: Funds should respond to the inquiry of donators faithfully and in time.
sentences.chinese: 对于捐赠人的查询，基金会应当及时如实答复。

sentences.english: Not very far, the National Academy members I’m sure would have you believe.
sentences.chinese: 的确不能，我想美国科学院院士给你满意答复的。

sentences.english: A:Well,I'll sleep on it and give you my answer tommorrow afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我再考虑一下，明天下午给你答复。

sentences.english: Danielle: I might have to get back to you.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮尔:我要晚点才能答复你。

sentences.english: I can give you my answer tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 让我想一想，明天给你答复。

definition: to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
to report/to give an account of/report
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
to reply to a telegram/to wire back
to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
